meanings.sent1: The tailcoated man looked very elegant at the party.
meanings.sent2: She felt special when she was tailcoated for the formal event.
meanings.sent3: The tailcoated penguin waddled around the icy terrain, looking quite dapper.
meanings.sent4: The tailcoated gentleman stood out among the casually dressed crowd.
meanings.sent5: The tailcoated outfit added a touch of sophistication to his appearance.

meanings.sent4: The tailcoated figure moved through the room like a character from a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: Her tailcoated attire made her stand out in the crowd.
